Our Process

We spend time to understand, define and realise your vision; exploring effective visual strategies and translating them into functional design.

Branding + Identity

Volcano provides creative branding solutions for companies of all sizes to create that ever important first impression and business ethic.

Web Design + Development

We develop and host great looking, dynamic and responsive websites designed to adapt to desktop & mobile devices.

Graphic Design

Volcano are passionate about graphic design. We produce innovative and graphic designers who can produce fresh, original and exciting design which is memorable, adds value and reinforces your unique branding and corporate identity.

Here are some of the graphic design services we offer?

  • Logo Design
  • Business Cards, Letterheads and Merchandising
  • Flyers, Posters and Brochures
  • 360o Start-up Packages
  • Powerpoint & Keynote Design
  • Mail Merge, B2B Communications... and much more

Make an impact with a living brand

Set yourself apart

Volcano specialises in building instantly recognisable and inspiring brands. By adopting a process of creative consultation and collaboration, we get to understand your project needs, the needs of your company and most importantly, the needs of your customers. Let us develop your brand.

Just starting out?

If you’re a new start-up business, establishing your brand is something you want to get right first time! Volcano can deliver the creative spark needed to get your business off the ground in style, with our full 360° Start-up Service; helping you realise your goals and bring your brilliant ideas into the real world.

Already established?

Is your current business identity not making the kind of impact it deserves? We can help you re-align and strengthen your visual presence with an injection of dynamic promotional campaigns, fresh online content and some new creative communication ideas that will let you do what you do best.... running your business.

Website Design

Your website is your most effective and powerful way of communicating your brand with your customers, but to make sure you get it right, your website needs to do more than just look good. We will build your site to be not only eye-catching and engaging to potential customers, whilst always adhering to the most up-to date of web standards, back-end systems and social media utilsation.

Here are some of the digtal services we have on offer:

  • Fully responsive web design and build
  • WordPress maintenaice and theme design and build
  • High-calibre Search Engine Optimisation
  • Web Hosting and on-going web management
  • Clear and effective copy and content
  • Animated Web and Social Media Content
